newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Potash cut to mkt perform.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Potash cut to mkt perform.

text.p: -- J.P. Morgan said analyst Donald Carson downgraded Potash Corp of Saskatchewan Inc to market performer from long-term buy.
-- Cited company's proposed acquisition of Arcadian Corp. In a research note, Carson said the acquisition "offers little synergy and appears to be driven by size considerations."

-- Said acquisition should be significantly accretive to earnings and cash flow but expects multiple contraction to almost entirely offset accretion from deal. Raised 1997 earnings estimate to $6.70 per share from $5.75.
-- However, cut FY 96 earnings estimate to $4.65 per share from $4.85 due to lower estimate of offshore potash volumes and increase in estimate of lower-pricd domestic sales.
-- Trimmed target price to $78 per share from $80.
